name: shopify-base-theme
description: Base theme: Vue + Tailwind + Shopify + Vite
author: Myntr

scripts.login: shopify theme list --store myntr-theme-dev.myshopify.com && shopify theme info
scripts.deploy: run-s vite:build && shopify theme push --path shopify
scripts.deploy:new: run-s vite:build && shopify theme push --unpublished --path shopify
scripts.shopify:settings:init: mv shopify/.shopifyignore shopify/tmpfile && shopify theme pull --live --only 'config/settings_data.json' --path shopify && shopify theme push --development --only 'config/settings_data.json' --path shopify && mv shopify/tmpfile shopify/.shopifyignore
scripts.shopify:settings:update: mv shopify/.shopifyignore shopify/tmpfile && shopify theme pull --only 'config/settings_data.json' --path shopify && shopify theme push --only 'config/settings_data.json' --path shopify && mv shopify/tmpfile shopify/.shopifyignore
scripts.shopify:settings:dev: mv shopify/.shopifyignore shopify/tmpfile && shopify theme pull --development --only 'config/settings_data.json' --path shopify && mv shopify/tmpfile shopify/.shopifyignore
